*Notes on lipu pu

About

Toki Pona is a human language I invented in 2001. It was my attempt to understand the meaning of life in 120 words. There are now thousands of speakers and 137 essential words.

Read about it in Gizmodo, Radio-Canada, Business Insider, The Guardian, Wikipedia, The Globe and Mail, The Atlantic, The New Yorker, ساسة بوست. More...
